name: Christmas in the Shadows
description:
## CHRISTMAS IN THE SIXTH WORLD…

’Twas the night before Christmas, and a blizzard blew through the neon streets of Seattle. When Shimura, the drunken troll of a street doc who runs the Mercy Street free clinic, finds a whole bunch of folks evicted from their homes, he’s none too happy about it. Does he stay out of the whole mess? Or does he revisit his old life as a shadowrunner and take matters into his own hands…? Well, that really depends on who’s been naughty and who’s been nice…
